FuncDef: This command configures rate for ICMPv6 time-exceeded messages.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the maximum number of time-exceeded messages to send, expressed as a decimal integer. This parameter must be specified with the seconds parameter. Values-10 to 1000.
Specifies the time frame in seconds used to limit the number of time-exceeded messages that can be issued, expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 60.
